metadata.name: Taunt Battleworld: Genesis Skull Pass
metadata.description: The Genesis Skull Pass, will act as a founder's pass to Taunt Battleworld, granting holders access to exclusive tournaments, exclusive NFT fighter drops (ex: Floyd Mayweather in game NFT's and other licensed IP fighter drops in their roadmap), special whitelist access for certain blood temple sales, merchandise, multipliers on engage-to-earn and most importantly an airdrop of one fully minted 3D acolyte warrior NFT to compete in tournaments in Taunt Battleworld. There will only be a limited supply of 2,500 Genesis Skull Passes ever created.  Taunt Battleworld is an NFT-Fighting Simulation Game created by industry veterans from Amazon, EA Games, Virtually Human (Zed-Run) and Unity. The team has been in development with investors like Polygon Studios, Genblock Capital and Polkastarter. Taunt is aiming to revolutionize the P2E space with their patented "Engage-To-Earn" interactive viewership technology allowing viewers of matches to earn currency. All Taunt NFT's will be 3D-rigged and ready to battle for in-game currency.
